SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId,NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle,NOTICE_TYPE AS noticeType,CREATE_TIME AS createTime,STATUS AS status,SUBHEADING AS subheading, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=ORG_ID AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=CREATE_USER) AS createUser, SEND_TIME AS sendTime,END_TIME AS endTime, APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus FROM NOTICE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND STATUS = '1' AND( FUN_INTE_ARRAY(USER_PRIV,#{accountId}) > 0
OR FUN_INTE_ARRAY(DEPT_PRIV,#{deptId}) > 0
OR FUN_INTE_ARRAY(LEAVE_PRIV,#{leaveId}) > 0
OR USER_PRIV = '@all' OR DEPT_PRIV = '@all' OR LEAVE_PRIV = '@all' ) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME ASC LIMIT ${page},10

SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId,NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle,NOTICE_TYPE AS noticeType,CREATE_TIME AS createTime,STATUS AS status, CASE WHEN FUN_INTE_ARRAY(READER,#{accountId}) = 0 then 'true' else 'false' END AS readStatus, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=ORG_ID AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=CREATE_USER) AS createUser,SEND_TIME AS sendTime,END_TIME AS endTime, APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus FROM NOTICE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND STATUS = '1' AND( FUN_INTE_ARRAY(USER_PRIV,#{accountId}) > 0
OR FUN_INTE_ARRAY(DEPT_PRIV,#{deptId}) > 0
OR FUN_INTE_ARRAY(LEAVE_PRIV,#{leaveId}) > 0
OR USER_PRIV = '@all' OR DEPT_PRIV = '@all' OR LEAVE_PRIV = '@all' ) AND ( END_TIME IS NULL OR END_TIME ='' OR END_TIME >=#{endTime} ) AND SEND_TIME <= #{endTime} ORDER BY readStatus DESC,CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId,NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle,NOTICE_TYPE AS noticeType,CREATE_TIME AS createTime,STATUS AS status, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=ORG_ID AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=CREATE_USER) AS createUser,SEND_TIME AS sendTime,END_TIME AS endTime, APPROVAL_STATUS AS approvalStatus FROM NOTICE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND STATUS = '0' AND NOTICE_TYPE IN( SELECT C.NOTICE_TYPE FROM NOTICE_CONFIG C WHERE C.ORG_ID=ORG_ID AND APPROVER_TYPE='0' AND FUN_INTE_ARRAY(APPROVER,#{accountId}) > 0 )
AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE#{search}
